mapper.select: select sum(tca.total) as total from type_count_application as tca
select count(user_id) as userCount from t_user
select count(place_id) as placeCount from t_place;

select twa.activity_title as activityTitle, tu.zn_name as znname, date_format(twa.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime from two_week_application as twa left join t_user as tu on twa.user_id = tu.user_id
select tca.verifyStatus, tca.total from type_count_application as tca order by tca.verifyStatus
